main_text:
False Statement
6. False Statement


With the main machinery in place for his analysis, the Stranger will 
shortly turn to false statement. But two preliminary topics remain: 
(1) How does negation work? (2) What is a statement?
entry_title: Method and Metaphysics in Plato’s Sophist and Statesman
hierarchy_title: Method and Metaphysics in Plato’s Sophist and Statesman || False Statement
